Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.util.Utilities

  • public class Utilities
extends Object
    A static class that provides miscellaneous functions.

      • mustObfuscate

        public static boolean mustObfuscate(String attrName,
                                    Schema schema)
        Returns whether an attribute value must be obfuscated because it contains sensitive information (like passwords).
        Parameters:
        attrName - the attribute name.
        schema - the schema of the server.
        Returns:
        true if an attribute value must be obfuscated because it contains sensitive information (like passwords) and false otherwise.

      • deriveColorHSB

        public static Color deriveColorHSB(Color base,
                                   float dH,
                                   float dS,
                                   float dB)
        Derives a color by adding the specified offsets to the base color's hue, saturation, and brightness values. The resulting hue, saturation, and brightness values will be constrained to be between 0 and 1.
        Parameters:
        base - the color to which the HSV offsets will be added
        dH - the offset for hue
        dS - the offset for saturation
        dB - the offset for brightness
        Returns:
        Color with modified HSV values

        Parameters:

      • applyFont

        public static String applyFont(CharSequence html,
                               Font font)
        Returns a String that contains the html passed as parameter with a span applied. The span style corresponds to the Font specified as parameter. The goal of this method is to be able to specify a font for an HTML string.
        Parameters:
        html - the original html text.
        font - the font to be used to generate the new HTML.
        Returns:
        a string that represents the original HTML with the font specified as parameter.

      • createImageIcon

        public static ImageIcon createImageIcon(String path,
                                        ClassLoader loader)
        Returns an ImageIcon or null if the path was invalid.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the image.
        loader - the class loader to use to load the image. If null this class class loader will be used.
        Returns:
        an ImageIcon or null if the path was invalid.

      • createImageIcon

        public static ImageIcon createImageIcon(String path)
        Returns an ImageIcon or null if the path was invalid.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the image.
        Returns:
        an ImageIcon or null if the path was invalid.

      • createImageIcon

        public static ImageIcon createImageIcon(byte[] bytes,
                                        int maxHeight,
                                        org.forgerock.i18n.LocalizableMessage description,
                                        boolean useFast)
        Creates an image icon using an array of bytes that contain the image and specifying the maximum height of the image.
        Parameters:
        bytes - the byte array.
        maxHeight - the maximum height of the image.
        description - the description of the image.
        useFast - whether a fast algorithm must be used to transform the image or an algorithm with a better result.
        Returns:
        an image icon using an array of bytes that contain the image and specifying the maximum height of the image.

      • updatePreferredSize

        public static void updatePreferredSize(JEditorPane pane,
                                       int nCols,
                                       String plainText,
                                       Font font,
                                       boolean applyBackground)
        Updates the preferred size of an editor pane.
        Parameters:
        pane - the panel to be updated.
        nCols - the number of columns that the panel must have.
        plainText - the text to be displayed (plain text).
        font - the font to be used.
        applyBackground - whether an error/warning background must be applied to the text or not.

      • stripHtmlToSingleLine

        Strips any potential HTML markup from a given string.
        Parameters:
        s - string to strip
        Returns:
        resulting string

      • getAttributeNameWithoutOptions

        public static String getAttributeNameWithoutOptions(String attrDesc)
        Returns the attribute name with no options (or subtypes).

        Note: normal code should use AttributeDescription.valueOf(attrName).getNameOrOID()

        However this method is used by UI code which sometimes receives strings which are not valid attribute descriptions.

        Parameters:
        attrDesc - the complete attribute name.
        Returns:
        the attribute name with no options (or subtypes).

      • getAdminConnection

        public static ConnectionWrapper getAdminConnection(ControlPanelInfo controlInfo,
                                                   DN bindDN,
                                                   String pwd)
                                            throws IOException,
                                                   ConfigReadException
        Returns the connection to connect to the administration connector of the server using the information in the ControlCenterInfo object (which provides the host and administration connector port to be used) and some LDAP credentials. It also tests that the provided credentials have enough rights to read the configuration.
        Parameters:
        controlInfo - the object which provides the connection parameters.
        bindDN - the base DN to be used to bind.
        pwd - the password to be used to bind.
        Returns:
        the connection to the server.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was a problem connecting to the server or the provided credentials do not have enough rights.
        ConfigReadException - if there is an error reading the configuration.

      • getUserDataConnection

        public static ConnectionWrapper getUserDataConnection(ControlPanelInfo controlInfo,
                                                      DN bindDN,
                                                      String pwd)
                                               throws IOException,
                                                      ConfigReadException
        Returns the connection to connect to the server using the information in the ControlCenterInfo object (which provides the host, port and protocol to be used) and some LDAP credentials. It also tests that the provided credentials have enough rights to read the configuration.
        Parameters:
        controlInfo - the object which provides the connection parameters.
        bindDN - the base DN to be used to bind.
        pwd - the password to be used to bind.
        Returns:
        the connection to the server.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was a problem connecting to the server or the provided credentials do not have enough rights.
        ConfigReadException - if there is an error reading the configuration.
